description:
Streamlined and adventure ready, the Zephyr 45 carries everything for an overnight to Elfin Lakes or the Bruce Peninsula. The trampoline-style suspension system creates space between your back and the pack, so cool air can flow through. Plus, you get a padded and contoured hipbelt and shoulder straps with an integrated whistle for safety. The top-loading design features a removeable floating lid, zippered sleeping bag compartment access, hydration compatibility, and trekking pole/ice axe loops. This fully equipped pack keeps life convenient on the trail or at your backcountry home away from home.

  • Made of lightweight 210-denier ripstop recycled nylon with burly 420-denier nylon in high wear areas
  • PFC-free DWR finish and a PU coating for superior weather resistance
  • Trampoline style back panel adds serious ventilation without sacrificing load management
  • Seamlessly integrated lumbar pad and hipbelt transfers weight without rubbing
  • EVA foam padded hipbelt offers a comfortable carry while pockets stash snacks and other small essentials
  • Padded, contoured ergonomic shoulder straps with a height adjustable sternum strap
  • Load lifter straps on shoulders for fine-tuned adjustments
  • Vertical side zip access into main compartment for quick access to contents
  • Floating lid with spindrift collar lets you adjust the height of your pack
  • Lid has a top pocket with key clip and underlid zippered mesh pocket
  • Front stretch mesh pocket for stashing a jacket on the go
  • Dual side mesh water bottles pockets
  • Side compression straps and sleeping pad straps cinch in the load and allow you to attach extra gear
  • Attachment loops and shock cord loops for securing trekking poles or an ice axe
  • Bottom zippered compartment provides a dedicated home for your sleeping bag
  • Hydration sleeve has a hanger hook and elastic routing strap on the shoulder straps. (Reservoir sold separately)
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
name: MEC Zephyr 45L Backpack - Men's
